full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/7/2023 eal First Class One Lempira 1988-1991 No. 0892592 CERTIFICATION The undersigned Director General of the National Registry for the People, founded by Decree No. 150, issued by the Sovereign National Congress the Seventeenth of November of Nineteen-Hundred-Eighty- Two, Certifies: That in the copy book No 23 pertaining to the Municipality of Puerto Cortes, Department of Cortes, year Nineteen- Hundred-Thirty, Folio No. 248, is found the birth record No. 00266, which literally says: "FRANCISCO PAGOAGA". At Puerto Cortes, on the sixteenth day of the month of October of Nineteen-Hundred- Thirty. Before me, Alberto Carias Quiroz, Municipal Secretary, and of the witnessess Gregorio J. Sarabia and Manuel Bulnes, both of legal age, office workers, Hondurans, and of this neighborhood, appeared Mr. Francisco Pagoaga, of legal age, single, Honduran and of this neighborhood, and stated that on Sunday, the twelfth of the current month, at about two A.M. at the home of Mrs. Maria Ovando, located in the section of El Trisagio, of this jurisdiction, was born a male child to whom the name FRANCISCO was given. He is the natural son of the declarant who hereby acknowledges the fact, and of Mrs. Agripita Ovando, of legal age, single, domestic worker, Honduran and of this neighborhood. The paternal grandparents of the newborn are Roque Lozano and Victoria Pagoaga, residents of La Ceiba and Rio Tinto, respectively; and maternal: Indalecio Ovando, deceased I read what was written to the declarant who ratified and signed it. Conforms = The legality of this certification is subject to Article No. 1501 of the current Civil Code. Issued at the City of Tegucigalpa, Central District on the Twenty-Sixth day of the month of September of Nineteen-Hundred-Eighty-Eight. Signed and sealed Hector Arnulfo Sanchez C. Jose Abraham Santos U. Director General of R.N.P. Secretary General of R.N.P. STATE OF NEW YORK ) COUNTY OF THE BRONX) SS: CITY OF NEW YORK ) I. Elizabeth Mero, having been duly sworn under the law hereby depose and say: That I have full knowledge of both the Spanish and the English languages and that the above translation, made by me, is to the best of my knowledge and belief a true and correct translation of the attached certification. Sworn to before me this Elizabeth hew 22nd day of January 1993 VICTOR ORTIZ NOTARY PUBLIC, State of New York No. 03-2976330 Qualified in Bronx County Commission Expires MAY 3 1993
